ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Oz: Reign of the Witch Queen
ComicInfo.Summary:
The epic OZ trilogy CONTINUES! Now that Dorothy Gale has ascended the throne of Oz, it's time to take the fight to her evil mother Zamora, and her deadly ally, Warlord! As disturbing details about Dorothy's birth are revealed, her allies plan to separate Warlord from his anti-magical sword, Reaver, and expose their enemies to Dorothy's new-found magical might. But when Smynth's master strategy relies upon the 'skills' of the drunken minstrel, Rho'Kat, what hope do they really have left?
Note: The digital edition (6/24/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.
